name: Yeti Slopes
description:
An avalanche is coming!

Strap on your skis and shred down that mountain!

And while you're at it, eat some tasty humans and do some sweet tricks.

Skinner Space - lead programmer, DrDrub- artist, some programming, Heyitsniko - composer


Controls:

Start - spacebar/enter

Movement - WASD/arrows

Jump - Spacebar

Tricks - Press space while holding a direction in the air. Successfully landing a trick will heal you half a heart!

This game was made for the Weekly Game Jam 204 with the theme: "Downhill".

Watch out for the bears! They do a full heart of damage!
